speaker: Sarah Bird
title: Announcing Azure AI Content Safety | Creating Safer Online Communities
description:
Sarah Bird is back to announce Azure AI Content Safety - Creating Safer Online Communities with Multimodal Content Filtering AI. She'll demo Responsible AI Integration with other products including Azure Vision Florence Models, and Azure OpenAI Multimodal Models!

Chapters:
00:00 AI Show Begins
00:18 Welcome and Intros
01:50 What is Azure AI Content Safety
04:53 Build Keynote recap 
12:25 What did GPT4 unlock
22:00 Safety System - Azure AI Content Safety
31:55 Metaprompt
41:10 Azure AI Studio Content Filtering
45:26 Wrap
